channel.title: Few-Shot Learning on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Breaking Long-Tailed Learning Bottlenecks: A Controllable Paradigm with Hypernetwork-Generated Diverse Experts
item.description: Controllable long-tailed learning achieved via hypernetwork-generated diverse experts, adapting to user preferences and distribution shifts.
